patterns: What is AICTE-Mitacs Globalink Research Internship (GRI) Scheme?
intents.responses: AICTE-Mitacs Globalink Research Internship (GRI) Scheme. Scheme to foster cross-border partnerships focussed on creating a platform that opens the path for collaborative research between Canada and India to a wider pool of student talent in India. For More Information : Scheme Guidelines

patterns: What is AICTE – SWANATH SCHOLARSHIP SCHEME?
intents.responses: AICTE – SWANATH SCHOLARSHIP SCHEME. AICTE has approved 'AICTE – SWANATH SCHOLARSHIP SCHEME' for children from any one of the following categories: 1. Orphan 2. Either or both parents died due to Covid-19 3. Wards of Armed Forces and Central Paramilitary Forces martyred in action (Shaheed) to provide them financial support of Rs. 50,000/- per annum for every year of study. For More Information : Scheme Guidelines

patterns: What is AICTE - YOUTH UNDERTAKING VISIT FOR ACQUIRING KNOWLEDGE (YUVAK)?
intents.responses: AICTE - YOUTH UNDERTAKING VISIT FOR ACQUIRING KNOWLEDGE (YUVAK). AICTE Scheme for study tour of ATAL TUNNEL, Himachal Pradesh– YOUTH UNDERTAKING VISIT FOR ACQUIRING KNOWLEDGE (YUVAK) For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is AICTE LILAVATI AWARD?
intents.responses: AICTE LILAVATI AWARD. AICTE intends to seek applications for AICTEs LILAVATI AWARD-2021-22 based on the theme “Women Empowerment” from the eligible teams of AICTE approved institutions, who have undertaken remarkable intervention for the cause and made an impact that showcases their work under eight different sub-themes. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is PG Scholarship?
intents.responses: PG Scholarship. Scholarship is awarded to full time GATE/GPAT qualified students admitted to M.E./ M. Tech/ M. Arch and M.Pharma courses in AICTE approved Institutions/Colleges @Rs. 12,400/- PM/ student. For More Information : Read More

patterns: What is AICTE Doctoral Fellowship (ADF)?
intents.responses: AICTE Doctoral Fellowship (ADF). Admitting full time meritorious research scholars by providing research fellowship who wants to seek admission to Ph.D. in AICTE approved Technical Institutes/University Departments for carrying out research in thrust areas For More Information : Read More

patterns: What is Pragati Scholarship?
intents.responses: Pragati Scholarship. Scholarship/Contingency is awarded to meritorious girls taking admission in AICTE approved Technical institution at Degree/ Diploma. Total 10000 scholarship are given @ Rs 50000 as incidentals each year. For More Information : Read More

patterns: What is Saksham Scholarship?
intents.responses: Saksham Scholarship. Scholarship/Contingency is awarded to Differently abled students taking admission in AICTE approved Technical institution at Degree/ Diploma. Scholarship given @ Rs 50000 as incidentals each year. For More Information : Read More

patterns: What is Support to Students for Participating in Competition Abroad (SSPCA)?
intents.responses: Support to Students for Participating in Competition Abroad (SSPCA). The objective of the scheme is to provide travel assistance registration fees to a team of minimum 2 to 10 students for attending competition at international level in order to encourage engineering students to improve their field of technical education. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is Prime Minister’s Special Scholarship Scheme – PMSSS?
intents.responses: Prime Minister’s Special Scholarship Scheme – PMSSS. Objective of the Scheme is to build up capacities in youth of J&K, educate, enable and empowering them to compete in normal course, enhancing and boosting employment potentials in students of J&K. Total 5000 scholarship are given @ Rs. 100000/- as Maintenance Charges and academic fee as Rs. 30000/- to General Degree, Rs. 125000/- to Engineering Degree & Rs. 300000/- to Medical Degree each year. For More Information : Read More

patterns: What is AICTE-INAE TRAVEL GRANT SCHEME?
intents.responses: AICTE-INAE TRAVEL GRANT SCHEME. An “AICTE-INAE Travel Grant Scheme” for Engineering Students to present papers abroad has been launched for enhancing the quality of engineering education in the country. For More Information : Application Form

patterns: What is Smart India Hackathon 2019?
intents.responses: Smart India Hackathon 2019 A unique initiative to identify new and disruptive digital solutions for solving the challenges faced by our country under the program of Smart India Hackathon 2017. This event was held on 1st – 2nd April 2017 for 36 hrs non-stop competition. 9544 technology students, 598 problems statements, 29 different central govt. ministries, 26 different Nodal centres & funding of Rs. 3 Lakh per team for 100 qualified teams.

patterns: What is M.Tech Projects as Internship with Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs)?
intents.responses: M.Tech Projects as Internship with Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) The main objective of the scheme is to nurture an innovation ecosystem that benefits the technologically deficient MSMEs and technical institutes both. 408 Small and Medium Enterprises have given requirement of 738 Technology students.

patterns: What are the available schemes for student ?
intents.responses: Available Schemes Are : AICTE-Mitacs Globalink Research Internship (GRI) Scheme, AICTE – SWANATH SCHOLARSHIP SCHEME, AICTE - YOUTH UNDERTAKING VISIT FOR ACQUIRING KNOWLEDGE (YUVAK), AICTE LILAVATI AWARD, PG Scholarship, AICTE Doctoral Fellowship (ADF), Pragati Scholarship, Saksham Scholarship, Support to Students for Participating in Competition Abroad (SSPCA), Prime Minister’s Special Scholarship Scheme – PMSSS, AICTE-INAE TRAVEL GRANT SCHEME, Smart India Hackathon 2019, M.Tech Projects as Internship with Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs)

patterns: What is General Guidelines for All FDC Schemes?
intents.responses: General Guidelines for All FDC Schemes. General Guidelines Applicable to all Faculty Development Schemes of AICTE. For More Information : General Guidelines

patterns: What is AICTE STTP-SFURTI?
intents.responses: AICTE STTP-SFURTI. STTP-SFURTI intends to conduct faculty and student trainings through financial assistance from AICTE to enable faculty members and students in the field of technical education to introspect and learn techniques that can help prepare faculty and students to impart there research work in the development of small-scale business for the nation. For More Information : Scheme Documents

patterns: What is AICTE- NATIONAL INITIATIVE FOR TECHNICAL TEACHERS TRAINING (AICTE - NITTT)?
intents.responses: AICTE- NATIONAL INITIATIVE FOR TECHNICAL TEACHERS TRAINING (AICTE - NITTT). In order to train the Inductee Teachers in AICTE approved / recognised institutions, National Initiative for Technical Teachers Training (for Inductee Teachers) has been launched. It imparts training to the Inductee Teachers in three phases. The first phase of the training programme for the Inductee Teachers shall be conducted in Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs) mode for eight modules on the SWAYAM platform through the NITTT portal www.nittt.ac.in followed by one-month industrial internship (second phase) and then mentor based training (third phase). For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is AICTE-Best Teachers Award (Visvesvaraya Best Teachers Award and Pritam Singh Foundation Award)?
intents.responses: AICTE-Best Teachers Award (Visvesvaraya Best Teachers Award and Pritam Singh Foundation Award). This scheme is aimed to recognize the meritorious faculties on Teachers Day i.e. 5th September every year at National level and encourage them to update themselves to the ever changing needs of higher education at global level and thereby becoming an effective contributor towards the society. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is AICTE-Quality Improvement program?
intents.responses: AICTE-Quality Improvement program. The main objective of the programme is to upgrade the qualification of the faculty members of the degree and polytechnic level institutions in the country. Financial assistance @Rs. 15000/-PM and Rs. 5000/ PM are given to Ph.D/ M.Tech Scholars. Presently 114 QIP centers are operational throughout the country. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is AICTE-RESEARCH PROMOTION SCHEME (RPS)?
intents.responses: AICTE-RESEARCH PROMOTION SCHEME (RPS). This scheme Promotes Research in identified thrust areas of in Technical Education. RPS is aimed to create research ambience in the institutes by promoting research in engineering sciences and innovations in established and newer technologies; and to generate Master’s and Doctoral degree candidates to augment the quality of faculty and research. The limit of funding is Rs 25 Lakh for project duration of 3 years. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is AICTE-Quality Improvement Programme (FOREIGN UNIVERSITY)?
intents.responses: AICTE-Quality Improvement Programme (FOREIGN UNIVERSITY). Scheme provides scholarships to the faculty who fulfils eligibility criteria and obtains admission in the Doctoral Degree programme leading to award of PhD degree in any of the enlisted top 500 universities/institutes (based on the QS ranking, the Times ranking and the Shanghai ranking) in the world. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is AICTE-FACULTY DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMME (FDP)?
intents.responses: AICTE-FACULTY DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMME (FDP). The scheme is intended to Institutions for induction training to teachers employed in AICTE approved Technical Institutions to facilitate up-gradation of knowledge and skill. Rs 5-7 Lakh are granted for the 2 weeks FDP. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is AICTE-Short Term Training Programme (STTP) (UT-J&K,Ladakh and NER)?
intents.responses: AICTE-Short Term Training Programme (STTP) (UT-J&K,Ladakh and NER). Short Term Training Program (STTP) intends to conduct faculty trainings through financial assistance from AICTE to enable faculty members in the field of technical education to introspect and learn techniques that can help prepare students for active and successful participants in a knowledge society. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is AICTE-TRAINING PROGRAMS FOR PHYSICAL EDUCATION TRAINERS/SPORT-GAMES TEACHERS/DIRECTOR OF SPORTS?
intents.responses: AICTE-TRAINING PROGRAMS FOR PHYSICAL EDUCATION TRAINERS/SPORT-GAMES TEACHERS/DIRECTOR OF SPORTS. To Develop the skill of the participants to involve the masses in traditional sports/games and fun games for physical activity through recreation. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is AICTE- TECHNICAL UNIVERSITY JOINT TRAINING PROGRAMS FOR TEACHERS?
intents.responses: AICTE- TECHNICAL UNIVERSITY JOINT TRAINING PROGRAMS FOR TEACHERS. The objective of the AICTE – University training programs is to conduct training for faculty members to prepare them for being successful in a knowledge society. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is AICTE- TECHNICAL UNIVERSITY JOINT TRAINING PROGRAMS FOR LIBRARIANS?
intents.responses: AICTE- TECHNICAL UNIVERSITY JOINT TRAINING PROGRAMS FOR LIBRARIANS. The objective, of AICTE – Technical University Training program for Librarians, is to conduct training for Librarians to prepare them for being successful and affective in a knowledge society. It provide a dynamic and quality user centered library and information services that enhance teaching, learning and research while inculcating life-long learning skills and fostering human development. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is AICTE-Professional Development Scheme?
intents.responses: AICTE-Professional Development Scheme. The scheme enables meritorious faculty to interact at International Level Conferences, both within and outside India, Seminars, and Symposia. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is AICTE-INAE- DISTINGUISHED VISITING PROFESSORSHIP SCHEME?
intents.responses: AICTE-INAE- DISTINGUISHED VISITING PROFESSORSHIP SCHEME. AICTE and INAE distinguished visiting Professor scheme envisages promotion of industry-institute interaction. For More Information : Application Form

patterns: What is AICTE – ISTE Orientation/ Refresher Programme?
intents.responses: AICTE – ISTE Orientation/ Refresher Programme. The objective is to conduct AICTE-ISTE Induction/ Refresher Programmes for the teaching faculty working in technical institutions. Total 100 Refresher programme & 50 Orientation programme with the funding of Rs. 300000 per programme. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is AICTE-Technical Book Writing & Translation?
intents.responses: AICTE-Technical Book Writing & Translation. To promote use of 'Scheduled Regional Language' in Technical Education for creating knowledge base in local language and to encourage creation of treasure of latest technical knowledge incorporating the newest developments by grant of financial support to the distinguished faculty/writers/translators. For More Information : Proprietary Article Certificate (PCA)

patterns: What is AICTE-DISTINGUISHED CHAIR PROFESSOR?
intents.responses: AICTE-DISTINGUISHED CHAIR PROFESSOR. The Emeritus Professor (Distinguished Practicing Engineer) Fellowship intends to utilize the expertise of highly qualified and experienced superannuated Engineers who have made undoubtable, unchallengeable, unparalleled and exceptional contribution to the society in their respective fields in any discipline in engineering for the benefit of students/faculty of host institutes & of institutes located in the adjoining areas. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What are the available schemes for faculty ?
intents.responses: Available Schemes Are : General Guidelines for All FDC Schemes, AICTE STTP-SFURTI, AICTE- NATIONAL INITIATIVE FOR TECHNICAL TEACHERS TRAINING (AICTE - NITTT), AICTE-Best Teachers Award (Visvesvaraya Best Teachers Award and Pritam Singh Foundation Award), AICTE-Quality Improvement program, AICTE-RESEARCH PROMOTION SCHEME (RPS), AICTE-Quality Improvement Programme (FOREIGN UNIVERSITY), AICTE-FACULTY DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMME (FDP), AICTE-Short Term Training Programme (STTP) (UT-J&K,Ladakh and NER), AICTE-TRAINING PROGRAMS FOR PHYSICAL EDUCATION TRAINERS/SPORT-GAMES TEACHERS/DIRECTOR OF SPORTS, AICTE- TECHNICAL UNIVERSITY JOINT TRAINING PROGRAMS FOR TEACHERS, AICTE- TECHNICAL UNIVERSITY JOINT TRAINING PROGRAMS FOR LIBRARIANS, AICTE-Professional Development Scheme, AICTE-INAE- DISTINGUISHED VISITING PROFESSORSHIP SCHEME, AICTE – ISTE Orientation/ Refresher Programme, AICTE-Technical Book Writing & Translation, AICTE-DISTINGUISHED CHAIR PROFESSOR

patterns: What is AICTE- IDEA LAB?
intents.responses: AICTE- IDEA LAB. AICTE has decided to establish AICTE-IDEA (Idea Development, Evaluation & Application) Lab in AICTE approved institutions, encouraging students for application of science, technologies, engineering and mathematics (STEM) fundamentals towards enhanced hands-on experience, learning by doing and product visualisation. For More Information : Website Link

patterns: What is AICTE-Scheme for Promoting Interests, Creativity and Ethics among Students (SPICES)?
intents.responses: AICTE-Scheme for Promoting Interests, Creativity and Ethics among Students (SPICES). To energize and position students club/ Chapters/ Societies as facilitating entity for pursuit of individual interests, creative work, showcasing talent, networking and teamwork opportunities, social experience; organization and management skills, exposure to professional ethics etc. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is GRANT FOR ORGANISING CONFERENCE?
intents.responses: GRANT FOR ORGANISING CONFERENCE. The scheme provides financial assistance to institutions for organizing Conference at National and International level in various fields of Technical Education. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is MODERNISATION AND REMOVAL OF OBSOLESCENCE (MODROBS)?
intents.responses: MODERNISATION AND REMOVAL OF OBSOLESCENCE (MODROBS). The scheme equips technical institutions with infrastructural facilities, laboratories, workshops, and computing facilities to enhance teaching, training and research capabilities. The limit of funding is Rs 20 Lakhs and project duration is 2 years For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is E- Shodh Sindhu(Subscription to e-journals)?
intents.responses: E- Shodh Sindhu(Subscription to e-journals). Free access to e-Journals/ e-Resources to AICTE approved Government/ Government-Aided technical institutes is facilitated through INFLIBNET, subscription of which is paid by AICTE. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is Scheme for Campus Accommodation & Facilities Enhancing Social experience (CAFES)?
intents.responses: Scheme for Campus Accommodation & Facilities Enhancing Social experience (CAFES). The scheme aims to support Government/ Government-aided engineering colleges/ University departments/Polytechnics for construction of girls/boys hostels for students /researchers belonging to SC&ST/ Differently abled/ NER students. Total funding is Rs 3.25 crore, which to be provided to institute to complete the project within the period of 3 years. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is AICTE- Grant for Augmenting Infrastructure in North Eastern Region (GAINER)?
intents.responses: AICTE- Grant for Augmenting Infrastructure in North Eastern Region (GAINER). To enhance the functional efficiency of the technical institutes located in far-flung areas of North East India, AICTE has launched a scheme for providing logistics support to the technical institutes of NER by extending financial assistance for construction of rain water harvesting system, alternative power support & availability/connection of internet facility For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What is Margdarshan Initiative?
intents.responses: Margdarshan Initiative. Senior academicians (serving or superannuated) shall be nominated as Margdarshak(MD) to act as individual mentors for guiding beneficiary institutes to achieve the NBA accreditation and enhance the quality of technical education. For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What are the available schemes for Institutional Development ?
intents.responses: Available Schemes Are : AICTE- IDEA LAB, AICTE-Scheme for Promoting Interests, Creativity and Ethics among Students (SPICES), GRANT FOR ORGANISING CONFERENCE, MODERNISATION AND REMOVAL OF OBSOLESCENCE (MODROBS), E- Shodh Sindhu(Subscription to e-journals), Scheme for Campus Accommodation & Facilities Enhancing Social experience (CAFES), AICTE- Grant for Augmenting Infrastructure in North Eastern Region (GAINER), Margdarshan Initiative

patterns: What is COLLABORATIVE RESEARCH SCHEME (CRS) UNDER TEQIP?
intents.responses: COLLABORATIVE RESEARCH SCHEME (CRS) UNDER TEQIP. To provide research grant for young TEQIP faculties recruited in different TEQIP institutes so as to collaborate for research and build research community among TEQIP Faculty, Regular faculty of Project institutions (focus and non-focus) & Premier institutions of the country For More Information : Scheme Document

patterns: What are the available schemes for Research & Innovations Development Schemes ?
intents.responses: Available Schemes Are : COLLABORATIVE RESEARCH SCHEME (CRS) UNDER TEQIP

patterns: What is Kaushal Augmentation and Restructuring Mission of AICTE (KARMA)?
intents.responses: Kaushal Augmentation and Restructuring Mission of AICTE (KARMA). AICTE is initiating “Kaushal Augmentation and Restructuring Mission of AICTE” (KARMA) for all AICTE approved institutions in the country to overcome the dual challenge of scarcity of skilled manpower in jobs and low skill level of those who are presently in jobs. For More Information : Read More

patterns: What is Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojna (PMKVY)?
intents.responses: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojna (PMKVY). AICTE is implementing the PMKVY for Technical Institutes scheme through AICTE approved Technical Institutions in the country.Under this Scheme in next three years, 10.5 Lakh youth are to be given Engineering Skills. For More Information : Read More

patterns: What is Saansad Aadarsh Gram Yojna?
intents.responses: Saansad Aadarsh Gram Yojna. Saansad Aadarsh Gram Yojana is a rural development programme broadly focusing upon the development in the villages which includes social development, cultural development and spread motivation among the people on social mobilization of the village community. For More Information : Read More

patterns: What is Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements (ARIIA)?
intents.responses: Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements (ARIIA). ARIIA is an initiative of Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD), Govt. of India to systematically rank all major higher educational institutions and universities in India on indicators related to “Innovation and Entrepreneurship Development” amongst students and faculties.. For More Information : Read More

patterns: What are the available schemes for General Schemes?
intents.responses: Available Schemes Are : Kaushal Augmentation and Restructuring Mission of AICTE (KARMA), Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojna (PMKVY), Saansad Aadarsh Gram Yojna, Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements (ARIIA)

patterns: What is INAE 4th INAE Youth Conclave scheduled on September 24, 2021 jointly with IIT Bombay; NITIE, Mumbai and ICT, Mumbai?
intents.responses: INAE 4th INAE Youth Conclave scheduled on September 24, 2021 jointly with IIT Bombay; NITIE, Mumbai and ICT, Mumbai. Find out how creativity can drive business results.

patterns: What is Reservation of Seats in Degree Level technical courses for States/ UTs lacking in such facilities for academic sessions 2021-22?
intents.responses: Reservation of Seats in Degree Level technical courses for States/ UTs lacking in such facilities for academic sessions 2021-22. Find out how creativity can drive business results.

patterns: What is The Drum x Adobe: Creativity finds a way?
intents.responses: The Drum x Adobe: Creativity finds a way. Find out how creativity can drive business results. For More Information : Visit the Link

patterns: What is Know Your College (KYC)?
intents.responses: Know Your College (KYC). Find out how creativity can drive business results. For More Information : Visit the website

patterns: What is Books At Special Price?
intents.responses: Books At Special Price. Find out how creativity can drive business results. For More Information : Visit the link

patterns: What is ISG-UBU Invites Indian-Mekong Scholars to Join the Project?
intents.responses: ISG-UBU Invites Indian-Mekong Scholars to Join the Project. Find out how creativity can drive business results. For More Information : Visit the link

patterns: What are the Oppertunities for students?
intents.responses: Available Oppertunities Are : INAE 4th INAE Youth Conclave scheduled on September 24, 2021 jointly with IIT Bombay; NITIE, Mumbai and ICT, Mumbai, Reservation of Seats in Degree Level technical courses for States/ UTs lacking in such facilities for academic sessions 2021-22, The Drum x Adobe: Creativity finds a way, Know Your College (KYC), Books At Special Price, ISG-UBU Invites Indian-Mekong Scholars to Join the Project

patterns: What is Grand Challenge for design & development for Mobile accessories products based on Li-ion Cells- seeking participation?
intents.responses: Grand Challenge for design & development for Mobile accessories products based on Li-ion Cells- seeking participation. Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY), Government of India has established a Centre of Excellence (CoE) for Products Based on Li-ion Cells (Post-Cell) along with the Government of Uttar Pradesh at CDAC Noida in association with India Cellular & Electronics Association (ICEA) for promoting design and development of products used as Mobile handset accessories and other electronic applications. The CoE will serve as a one-stop facility/centre for R&D, design & development of products based on Li-ion Cells (Post-Cell). For More Information : Visit the Link

patterns: What is National Apprenticeship Training Scheme (NATS)?
intents.responses: National Apprenticeship Training Scheme (NATS). Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY), Government of India has established a Centre of Excellence (CoE) for Products Based on Li-ion Cells (Post-Cell) along with the Government of Uttar Pradesh at CDAC Noida in association with India Cellular & Electronics Association (ICEA) for promoting design and development of products used as Mobile handset accessories and other electronic applications. The CoE will serve as a one-stop facility/centre for R&D, design & development of products based on Li-ion Cells (Post-Cell). For More Information : Visit the website

patterns: What is FOSSEE Summer Fellowship 2021 Online?
intents.responses: FOSSEE Summer Fellowship 2021 Online. Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY), Government of India has established a Centre of Excellence (CoE) for Products Based on Li-ion Cells (Post-Cell) along with the Government of Uttar Pradesh at CDAC Noida in association with India Cellular & Electronics Association (ICEA) for promoting design and development of products used as Mobile handset accessories and other electronic applications. The CoE will serve as a one-stop facility/centre for R&D, design & development of products based on Li-ion Cells (Post-Cell). For More Information : Visit the Link

patterns:
What is Internship & Project Training for Diploma/UG/PG Students of Engineering/Finance/Management/Law stream at ALTTC, BSNL, Ghaziabad
?
intents.responses: Internship & Project Training for Diploma/UG/PG Students of Engineering/Finance/Management/Law stream at ALTTC, BSNL, Ghaziabad . Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY), Government of India has established a Centre of Excellence (CoE) for Products Based on Li-ion Cells (Post-Cell) along with the Government of Uttar Pradesh at CDAC Noida in association with India Cellular & Electronics Association (ICEA) for promoting design and development of products used as Mobile handset accessories and other electronic applications. The CoE will serve as a one-stop facility/centre for R&D, design & development of products based on Li-ion Cells (Post-Cell). For More Information : Know More

patterns: What are the Oppertunities for students?
intents.responses: Available Oppertunities Are : INAE 4th INAE Youth Conclave scheduled on September 24, 2021 jointly with IIT Bombay; NITIE, Mumbai and ICT, Mumbai, Reservation of Seats in Degree Level technical courses for States/ UTs lacking in such facilities for academic sessions 2021-22, The Drum x Adobe: Creativity finds a way, Know Your College (KYC), Books At Special Price, ISG-UBU Invites Indian-Mekong Scholars to Join the Project, Grand Challenge for design & development for Mobile accessories products based on Li-ion Cells- seeking participation, National Apprenticeship Training Scheme (NATS), FOSSEE Summer Fellowship 2021 Online, Internship & Project Training for Diploma/UG/PG Students of Engineering/Finance/Management/Law stream at ALTTC, BSNL, Ghaziabad
